All Heroes:

{colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} -4 -50%% {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} Heal Received if HP not below 50%%

All Heroes: {colour_start|harmful}Suffer{colour_end} 2 HP DMG if HP not below 50%%

Friendly Skill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Target:{colour_end} +10%% DMG

{colour_start|bleed}Bleed{colour_end} 1 pts/rd for 3 rds
When Hit: {colour_start|blight}Blight Attacker{colour_end} 2 pts/rd for 3 rds {colour_start|skill_unselectable}(140%% base){colour_end}
When Hit: {colour_start|buff}Buff Self:{colour_end} +30%% DMG / +10%% CRT
On Monster Kill: {colour_start|buff}Buff Party:{colour_end} +1%% MAX HP
+5%% PROT per 10%% HP missing
-2%% Crits Received Chance per 10%% HP missing
On Attack: {colour_start|move}Back{colour_end} 1 if in position 1
Friendly Skill: {colour_start|move}Forward{colour_end} 1
On Attack Hit: Self: 1 Block at {colour_start|deathdoor}Death's Door{colour_end}
No {colour_start|healhp}Healing{colour_end} Received if not at {colour_start|deathdoor}Death's Door{colour_end}
{colour_start|deathdoor}Death's Door{colour_end} may {colour_start|stress}Stress{colour_end} the Party
{colour_start|notable}Cooldown: 1 rd{colour_end}
A world view buttressed by dogmatic desperation, invariably leads to single-minded fanaticism.
Let the organ notes ring out from the Abbey - the Sisters are gathering...
They meet in secret, that none may know the horrifying depths of their inquiries.
The Flame is but Half the Story
Neither the clergy nor the congregation dared defy the Sisters' request, and the unwilling attendees of the unorthodox ceremony wisely kept any objections to themselves.
Dark Inquisition
As rumours of necromancy proliferated from the hamlet, only the naive thought it coincidence when a contingent of Apostates arrived to make inquiries.

Denounced by the Church for "straying from the Light", the Apostates seek out those texts declared forbidden and apocryphal in their search for the Truth. Many question their morality, but none doubt their tenacity...

Enshrouded in ritual robes, and wielding unsavoury relics, the Apostate strikes fear into the heart of enemies and allies alike. Despite renouncing the healing practices of the Vestal, she still has the uncanny ability to keep her allies from succumbing to death, albeit through very different techniques.

Often ostracised from their communities, these unrepentant women have become proficient at fending for themselves. Intrepid eavesdroppers have returned from their camps with tales of strange, unorthodox ceremonies and unsettling rituals - even fanciful reports of speaking with the dead. These claims are surely embellished, yet the rumours persist...
Makeshift Relic
Simple Relic
Worthy Relic
Venerated Relic
"The Master's Remains"
Relic
Crudely Altered Robes
Handcrafted Robes
Artisan Robes
Imbued Robes
"Necromancer's Robes"
Robes of Power

Tenebrosity
Incite

Tenebrosity
Desecrate
DIALOGUE WITH THE DEAD
WILL TO LIVE
SUSTAIN FLESH
UNORTHODOX CEREMONY
Do not fret, your death will be fleeting.
Prepare yourself, lest the abyss render you mute.
What do you see from the other side?
You defied death once - do not yield now!
When the abyss beckons, do not go willingly.
Death cannot be escaped! But it can be postponed.
We need not fear death, yet we need not embrace it.
There are many Truths; the Light is but one facet.
The Flame may be extinguished, but the Dark is eternal.
Light and Dark are but two sides of the same coin!
Mundane Scripture
Bishop's Gift
Foul Bouquet
Necromancer's Claws
Necromancer's Scrolls
Dagger of Libation
Fragment from the Well
Dolores' Head
Bishop's Head
Apostate's Scrawls
"With Love, -J"
"Given willingly, of course..."
"No more than he deserved."
"The Flame is but half the story..."
"Brittle, malodorous shards break off at the slightest touch."
"There is power in the Blood..."
"Her endurance was unspeakable."
"The hypocrite relied upon texts he declared heretical."
"Keep moving. Never forget Dolores."
Walking Corpse
Empower Walking Corpse
Summoned
Cleave
Clumsy Slice
Dead Weight
Heresy
Peer Pressure
Iron Queen
Red Hook Corrupted
Misguided Crusade
Manslaughter
King's Folly
Red Salvation
Dancing Queen
Inordinate Exsanguination
The Last Laugh
Vengeance Manifest
Our new scripture says nothing of liquor!
I gamble with my life already. What's one more bet...
I am still woman under these robes...
But I speak Truth! The Light is but a deception!
You're not listening! The Flame is a lie, they are deceiving us all!
Our sect is forbidden from praying here.
They insist the "Higher Power" must be the Light. We disagree.
We are all Sisters... but our family does not get along.
Darkness engulf you!
You shall suffer as I have!
You are DAMNED!
You shall know pain!
Do you see the abyss now?
Look upon the abyss!
You will know the abyss!
The Light was only holding me back!
The Flame was weak! Look at me now!
Your final moments shall be exquisite!
I see the abyss! It is beautiful!
Unfathomable power is within my grasp!
It is true! The Dark holds unimaginable power!
The visions fade. Illusions -- or glimpses of Truth?
The Flame is but half the story...
Do you see great visions from the precipice?
Do you feel the strength of the abyss?
Isn't the abyss beautiful?
A glimpse into the abyss. I envy you.
A taste of the other side. Savour it.
I am no stranger to injury!
I only grow stronger!
Visions of the abyss!
Pain is my ally!
Now let the Dark empower you!
Now you shall feel the vigor of our recitations!
There is strength in pain.
The Light would have been a comfort...
I thought I commanded the shadows, but this place...
I'm growing to miss my duplicitous life at the abbey...
They were naive fools at the abbey, but they were happy fools...
His words resonate in a way that mine do not!
He wields the lost page of our scripture!
He performs the rituals with such ease!
The tomes' descriptions could not prepare me for the experience!
He is indifferent to my admiration -- we will be torn asunder regardless!
To be on the receiving end is unbearable!
Light and Dark are not one and the same after all. What have I done?
Junia? Is that really you?
Anything for you, Junia!
I... I have said too much.
If you tell anyone I will hurt you.
Your words bring only foreboding.
Your words trouble me.
That passage made me uneasy.
Your sermons are disquieting.
I do not recall that verse.
That verse is new to me.
Was that psalm altered?
These do not seem like holy words...
Are you sure these are holy words?
Did the torch just flicker?
Your hymns echo in the dark...
Shadows move when you speak...
Preach it, Sister!
A superb reading, Sister.
An inspiring recitation.
She speaks the Truth!
Accept the Truth, as we have!
The Truth in our scripture cannot be denied.
We were right to abandon the Flame.
Yes! All power is divine, not just the Flame!
The bishop was naive. We knew better.
Bishop banned these texts as he could not face the Truth.
BLASPHEMY!
Those texts are FORBIDDEN!
You are defiling our faith!
I can't believe I once called you Sister!
Recant, and the Sisterhood may yet take you back!
It is not too late to come back to the Light!
What have you done, Sister?
You will not make me doubt my faith!
Your words beget revulsion, not revelation.
Bishop was right to cast you out!
I am glad that Bishop cannot see what you have become.
We can never be together again.
Light forgive me! I should not have abandoned you.
I must not fear martyrdom. I will not!
Grant me passage through these cursed halls...
The new scripture did not warn of this!
Spare me, oh Light, I was foolish to stray from the Flame!
The bishop knows of our treachery!
You test me? Shall I demonstrate our newfound power?
We were right! We were right!
I hear your whispering! The rumours exaggerate!
Is it we who were wrong? Is it us who are the naive?
You mock me behind my back! Your precious Flame will burn you yet!
Through suffering, I will know my faith! We will all know!
Death is patient, I am not!
Let us look into the abyss once more!
Pain gives us strength -- we shall be mighty!
What I once feared, I have become!
I am chosen -- you are nothing!
You were stupid to think you had the strength to come here.
Stop soiling yourself and fight!
The flock is weak, stupid, and you are but a lamb!
The bishop put up a better fight than you!
Cast aside your gods, I bring you the Truth.
I have sacrificed much... now I shall claim all!
If anyone gets out alive, it will be me!
Give those relics to me, they look important.
You fools still believe the falsehoods, it is I who should be rewarded!
There is no higher purpose here...
This mission frays my spirits...
Why does everyone hate me? The bishop was understandable, but the others?
It was all for naught. I should have concealed my doubt and remained.
The Flame is a lie, but the Truth brings me no joy.
There is Light in the stones! And in the smiles of flies!
My eyes are on fire... So beautiful, I must gouge them out!
My robes are so delicious, why have I not noticed before?
Do I hear singing? Why are the torches singing? Silence!
Bishop! I love thee! We are not so different!
My faith shall be my guide!
My purity shall extinguish all unbelievers!
Fret not -- I will keep us from ruin, I am unafraid!
The night is black, but we may use its power for our own ends!
My path is clear!
We shall endure! The pain has purpose!
Power courses through me!
My power is unmatched! They will know the meaning of suffering.
Though caged in steel, my faith burns through.
I set my soul aflame. Nothing can extinguish it.
The old ways still have some merit.
Power is purity!
The power is with us. Fear not the black.
Do not despair. As the black deepens, my power grows...
Taste the power that comes from accepting the Truth.
Your name is whispered from the Dark. You are most blessed.
We will end the unbelievers!
This is a blessing of power. Do not question its origin.
My suffering has prepared me well.
The old ways still have some merit.
We should not have abandoned the Flame!
The Flame was a charade, but the Dark holds no comfort.
The shadows crawl with nameless terrors. I thought I was prepared!
That stone... it gazes at me!
Must watch their eyes. They all know of my vows...
There is a presence here. It toys with us!
Only through pain shall we know forgiveness!
The pain only proves my devotion!
Only the unfaithful fear death!
Even the nauseatingly patient Church would reject you.
You fools would not recognise the Truth if it smacked you in the face!
You would not survive even the first trial. Pitiful.
I will take it all, including your future.
Your crying is disturbing my focus! Cease your whining!
I will subsume your essence into mine.
Why did they abandon me?
You look upon me with fear, yet I am powerless.
I sought to command the Dark, but now it subsumes me.
You speak through my tongue! I must remove it!
My flesh turns black! I am the abyss!
You are but children! Motherless children!
I cannot match them!
No! NOOO! They are too strong!
Get back! We face annihilation!
Stay in front where I can see you!
Get back! They will take us!
You will stab me in the back! I know your mind!
The abyss calls to me -- I crave another glimpse!
Let the pain speak to me!
They may wound me, but I will shred their very essence!
A party! Shall we dance?
I am hungry! I shall not queue any longer!
Let me through! They will forgive my apostasy!
The verses number 36 and so too the constellations!
There is music in the air! LA, LA-LOO, LA-LOOEEOOOAAA!
Take my arm, like the ladies on the promenade! Weee!
The Truth? Another lie. We know nothing, I have no faith left.
Why slow the inevitable?
What is the point of life, of faith?
I am unworthy. I should not be here.
I cannot lead. I am too... inexperienced.
Take my place. You are stronger than I.
I am chosen!
Their souls must suffer!
I cannot see the enemy! Move over!
Success is assured if I am kept from interruption.
You cannot comprehend my importance.
Protect me! Your sacrifice will not be forgotten.
Dark whispers bind me! I have lost control!
Blackness... the likes of which I cannot command.
I... I can't move... protect me!
I alone am the bearer of the Truth!
The texts urge patience! I will not defy them!
The darkness plays tricks, I will hold fast.
My faith alone is the measure of righteousness!
I walk my own path!
No. The time is not yet right.
It is hopeless.
Neither the light nor the shadows can save us now.
Call down the Flame yourself. It heeds me no longer.
Be quiet, the bricks are singing!
No! The bishop would be disappointed!
I must not! The sisters will reject me again!
I am no lamb -- I am the wolf!
I can decide for myself! I am no scullery girl!
Hands off! I command myself, thank you!
I relish my trials, I relish my wounds!
Spill my blood! Its purity shall exorcise you!
I hurl myself on the altar of faith!
Punishment will continue until you accept the Truth!
I banish you, unbelievers!
Naught but lambs. The wolf will show the flock no mercy.
The rewards will be mine alone!
My power came at a great price. I use it as I wish.
The scripture alone commands me. None else have the right.
I am just a shadow in the dark -- nothing at all.
I am no hero! Just a little girl in a woman's garb!
Poor experience begets poor decisions...
The stars and sun are of the same Light, yet I see neither...
One stunted tree in a fruiting orchard...
The Flame flickers... the shadows obey.
Shadows are the children of Light...
These shadows dance to a different master.
I have had a vision! Our deaths are imminent!
I hear whispers of torture and misery!
Conspiracy, all around me...
Something flits in the corners of my gaze. When I look, it is gone.
You traitors conspire against forces you cannot comprehend.
The bishop knows my mind! My doubts!
Pain is the gateway to the Truth!
We die today. You, too, shall see the abyss.
We do not truly know life until we have touched death.
I'll strike you all down if you get in my way.
Silence! You mongrels are interrupting my prayer.
You think the Light will protect you? You are as naive as the bishop.
I alone hold this pitiful group together.
You unbelievers do not deserve your share of the food, give it to me.
The scriptures tell of secrets you shall never know.
Even the new tomes no longer resonate, all is lost...
My doubts fester. Is it too late to find our way back to the Light?
The bishop was right. The tomes should have stayed locked away.
Quickly, hide the tomes, I hear the bishop approaching!
We mustn't deny our true natures. These robes can be removed, you know...
Mutilation is a most holy act. Any takers?
Show me the abyss! The pain is worth the power!
My blood will purify you!
The bishop was right. I do not deserve life.
I should have ended it when the abbey cast us out.
I am the flame! Extinguish my lies!
You want to see power? Kill me then, and despair.
I will not sit idly by and wait for your betrayal!
I was betrayed once before. This time I will strike first!
My punishment was severe. You deserve worse!
Pain grants us power, and you are still weak!
The truth is inside you -- it must be exposed!
The bishop returns! Silence him!
Power through sacrifice!
This blood is yours! Now grant me POWER!
I care not about judgment... I tire of slavery.
Flame, consume me. I submit.
SHADOW AND DEATH!
I deserve this.
They will tell the others -- I cannot allow it!
We cannot go back! There are voices behind us...
Martyrdom is the best I could have hoped for.
I had no respect in life. Perhaps I shall gain some in death.
The prospect of pain does not deter me.
You should fear ME more than they!
I WILL LIVE IN IGNOMINY NO LONGER!
I WILL NOT FLEE INTO THE NIGHT AGAIN!
We cannot hope to match such strength.
I am breaking!
They know my treachery!
They seek to suppress the Truth!
For that, I claim your soul!
Ungh! For these injuries, I require a greater fee!
(deep inhale) Yes... again!
It hurts, yes... But also... (blesses herself)
Bishop! Stop!
Please! Be kind to me, Sisters!
No! No, please, NOOO!
Leave me be! PLEASE!
My power is attracting them! They can smell it!
I like not how that one is looking at me!
No! I must know abyss!
NOOO! The darkness calls to me!
Please, Bishop, not again -- stay your hand!
They fear my retribution!
Let me kill it! Its soul must perish by my hand!
Stop! I must witness its passing firsthand.
You still cling to the Light. You will witness true power!
Even the bishop hit harder than that!
Mother - Father! Too late! The convent has taken me...
Hah! The look on their faces when I told them!
NOOOO! You may have doomed us all!
Now I know our end has come....
I know a liar when I see one. You missed on purpose!
Traitor! You could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
Eight year-old girls in the convent are better trained...
Even the lambs could fight better than you!
I'll save my blessings for those who deserve it.
Do you mean to make me do all the work?
But I am only a child. How can you ask that of me... How...
Stop fighting, Sisters, we must work together!
It will be me next, I am sure of it.
They, too, ally with the darkness. I am powerless against them.
Someone has trained them... We have been tricked!
You LET yourself be hit... Why would that be?
Yes... Your pain makes you powerful.
What do you see, on the precipice of oblivion? Is it glorious?
You cry at the slightest discomfort. Pathetic.
How uninspiring you are.
You spill the wine!
Hit her again, Bishop!
I thought I knew despair.
How I long for the safe lies of the convent...
I know a liar when I see one. They missed on purpose!
Traitor! They could not have missed so easily! TRAITOR!
I hear the song of the sisterhood. The burning women...
The bishop will not stay his hand.
We should rout, not rearrange!
You wouldst have me move into harms way!
We must be still -- the bishop will see!
Any excuse to brush by the virgin. Even my new robes do not deter.
This is a test of faith. I will not budge!
I will not retreat, and neither shall you!
Stand still and accept your fate!
You deserve everything that's coming to you.
Will no-one rid me of this meddlesome bishop?
Whispers in the darkness! Stop, listen!
Why? To tarnish my purity? You are jealous!
Stand away! You mean to poison me!
I thrive on pain. It's the way of my order.
Let me endure it a bit first. It rejuvenates my soul.
If the Truth alone cannot suffice, then we are lost.
Save it for someone deserving.
I don't need anything, not even the Light! Hahaha...
The scripture forbids such comforts.
Don't touch me! That is not our way!
Don't distract me with such foolishness.
You wouldst push me over the precipice!
No! I crave the power of the abyss!
Take your hands off me... unless you seek to wound me further!
My vows demand I refuse. You wouldn't understand.
This is my destiny, let me be.
I do not deserve your mercy. I showed none.
We will all expire. Why wait?
It's full of stars - beautiful and horrifying!
The whip. The cat. The lash. The scourge.
I embrace only the shadow.
No! You seek to weaken me!
I cannot trust you!
You wish to provide aid? Do you doubt my tenacity?
Stay back! My power grows as my wounds mount!
The whispers demand my blood!
Save your blessings! We relish in suffering!
My own incantations are sufficient.
Stop. I am tainted enough already...
With every suggestion, my resolve is corrupted...
I cannot accept help from the faithless...
I descend into the black lake below. I am lost...
My skin is crawling! Changing!
I... I cannot read the ritual while I shudder so...
It would attract unwanted attention!
The rituals were inadequate -- this blackness is suffocating!
And reveal my secrets? I think not.
Do I command the Dark, or am I merely its puppet?
The bishop would scorn my apostasy.
In my life, suffering has been a potent motivator...
I ought to impose ten lashings instead...
A brush with death can truly purify the spirit.
Enough! I cannot bear your insufferable bleating!
I shan't waste my time, you are beyond help.
You are unworthy of my blessings!
My blessings would only disturb you.
I must spend more time on my recitation.
I have tomes to read. Entertain yourself.
No invokation in the world will make any difference now.
Scripture fails me; was I too hasty to dismiss the Flame?
Even the true scriptures speak nothing of such adversity.
My versebook pages flutter on the wind - like butterflies!
They whipped us in the Convent, day and night...
The bishop forbids the reading of these tomes.
Verse CXI: The pure shall refuse all strangers' gifts.
You mean to coax me back to the Light!
Pain is a gift. I cherish it.
I can take more yet. I do not ask for your charity.
The lamb means to protect ME? How amusing.
I've had enough of your "wisdom".
The Light cannot illuminate one shrouded in black...
My life, wasted. There is no power in faith.
I do not answer to you anymore, Bishop!
You speak in tongues! SILENCE!
The Verses forbid me to eat this... whatever this is.
The Verses say nothing about fuzzy bread... hmmm...
"Endurance" is the chief tenet of our sect...
I decline. My faith shall nourish me.
I am undeserving; our mission is yet unfinished.
We may never make it out of this labyrinth. We must ration.
There are sins I have yet to atone for.
I'll not eat that! It swarms with dragonflies!
